Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or scientific backing to support the effectiveness of applying toothpaste on pimples.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that toothpaste can reduce pimples without considering potential side effects or skin irritations.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the statement from health experts who warn that toothpaste can irritate the skin and cause severe discoloration.
Understate: The claim understates the potential harm or negative effects of applying toothpaste on pimples.
Exist alternative explanation: Health experts recommend using targeted acne treatments instead of toothpaste to treat pimples, suggesting an alternative explanation.
